game.name: Kit's Quest
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Kit’s Quest is a challenging, fun-filled 3D platformer featuring a brave fox on a journey to rescue his sister from a menacing dragon! Explore a huge, interconnected world, collect magical dragon teeth, and learn cool abilities as Kit treks towards Skyreach Summit to save the day!
